title: Wine Quality Prediction using MLOps
features: Designed and deployed a reproducible MLOps pipeline for wine quality prediction, orchestrating data ingestion, validation, transformation, and model training with Python, Pandas, and XGBoost, and automating artifact management via MLflow.
Implemented end‑to‑end CI/CD using GitHub Actions, Docker, and pytest, ensuring 100% code quality and seamless model versioning for production deployment through FastAPI and Uvicorn.

Applied feature engineering and hyperparameter tuning to boost model accuracy over baseline, visualized key insights with Matplotlib/Seaborn, and maintained rigorous logging and monitoring for continuous improvement.
